label: 太宰府
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: The government-general for Kyushu, founded in the seventh century. Located in Chikuzen Province (Fukuoka Prefecture). Responsible for foreign affairs and the supervision of Kyushu governance. Later fell under control of the Bakufu.　[筑前]
